communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: LACRIS Member List 2024
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am seeking a list or other documents naming the law enforcement agencies that can access the Los Angeles County Regional Identification System (LACRIS) and that can use the LACRIS facial recognition bio-metric database.  The LACRIS website indicates that there are 64 of these agencies.  

Please contract me if this request is unclear.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Paul Tepper

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Hoffmann-Miller FOIA Tasking
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Records created or received by CBP's FOIA office in the course of responding to the FOIA request assigned receipt numbers CBP-2019-030668 and/or CBP-2019-030712, including any litigation response to 2:20-cv-6427-AB (E.D. Pa), including: FOIA Tasking Forms and responses from records custodians; records of searches conducted and supplemental searches; records of efforts undertaken in an effort to comply with court orders in the litigation.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andrew Free
